entry.title: vimrc Plug 공유
entry.content:
Plug-Manager 설치

가이드에 따라서 설치해줘야 한다.

vim-plug 설치

주의

명령어 vim ~/.vimrc

  • 주피터는 Plug 실패했다. 추후 수정해서 올리겠습니다.

.vimrc 코드


"- For Neovim: stdpath('data') . '/plugged'
" - Avoid using standard Vim directory names like 'plugin'
call plug#begin('~/.vim/plugged')
" Make sure you use single quotes
set hlsearch
set backspace=indent,eol,start
set backspace=2  "compatible with version 5.4 and earlier
" Shorthand notation; fetches https://github.com/junegunn/vim-easy-align
Plug 'junegunn/vim-easy-align'
Plug 'vim-scripts/indentpython.vim'
Plug 'nvie/vim-flake8'
Plug 'jnurmine/Zenburn'
" Any valid git URL is allowed
Plug 'https://github.com/junegunn/vim-github-dashboard.git'
Plug 'https://github.com/raphamorim/lucario.git'
" airline
Plug 'https://github.com/vim-airline/vim-airline.git'
Plug 'vim-airline/vim-airline-themes'
Plug 'https://github.com/airblade/vim-gitgutter.git'

"jupyter
"Plug 'jupyter-vim/jupyter-vim'
"Plug 'jupyter-vim/jupyter-vim'
"Plug 'jpalardy/vim-slime', { 'for': 'python' }
"Plug 'hanschen/vim-ipython-cell', { 'for': 'python' }
Plug 'https://github.com/ivanov/vim-ipython.git'

"print(hex(.))
"Python syntax
"Plug 'https://github.com/vim-python/python-syntax.git'

"multiple cursor
Plug 'terryma/vim-multiple-cursors'

"vimshell
Plug 'Shougo/vimproc.vim', {'do' : 'make'}
Plug 'https://github.com/Shougo/vimshell.vim.git'

"fugitive
Plug 'https://github.com/tpope/vim-fugitive.git'

"tagbar
Plug 'https://github.com/majutsushi/tagbar.git'

"YouComplteMe
Plug 'https://github.com/ycm-core/YouCompleteMe.git'

"find  control + p
Plug 'ctrlpvim/ctrlp.vim'

"tagbar
Plug 'majutsushi/tagbar'

" Multiple Plug commands can be written in a single line using |   separators
Plug 'SirVer/ultisnips' | Plug 'honza/vim-snippets'

"syntatic 검사
Plug 'scrooloose/syntastic'

"systax hilighting
Plug 'kchmck/vim-coffee-script'

" On-demand loading
Plug 'scrooloose/nerdtree', { 'on':  'NERDTreeToggle' }
Plug 'tpope/vim-fireplace', { 'for': 'clojure' }
Plug 'preservim/nerdcommenter'

"gitgutter
Plug 'https://github.com/airblade/vim-gitgutter.git'


" Using a tagged release; wildcard allowed (requires git 1.9.2 or above)
Plug 'fatih/vim-go', { 'tag': '*' }
" Plugin options
Plug 'nsf/gocode', { 'tag': 'v.20150303', 'rtp': 'vim' }

" Plugin outside ~/.vim/plugged with post-update hook
Plug 'junegunn/fzf', { 'dir': '~/.fzf', 'do': './install --all' }

" Unmanaged plugin (manually installed and updated)
Plug '~/my-prototype-plugin'

" Initialize plugin system
call plug#end()

set hlsearch "set search hilighting
set fileencodings=utf-8 " set file encoding
set display+=lastline " Always try to show a paragraph
set title " set the window's title
"set termguicolors

"Python
"let NERDTreeIgnore=['\.pyc$', '\~$'] "ignore files in NERDTree
""colorscheme solarized
colorscheme lucario
set number
let g:go_version_warning = 0

"let g:ycm_server_python_interpreter = '/usr/bin/python3'
let g:ycm_global_ycm_extra_conf = '~/.vim/plugged/YouCompleteMe/third_party/ycmd/.ycm_extra_conf.py'
autocmd filetype cpp nnoremap <C-w> :w <bar> exec '!g++ '.shellescape('%').' -o '.shellescape('%:r').' && ./'.shellescape('%:r')<CR>

"Python syntax
"let g:python_highlight_all = 1

let g:ycm_confirm_extra_conf = 0
"To avoid conflict snippets
let g:ycm_key_list_select_completion = ['<C-j>', '<Down>']
let g:ycm_key_list_previous_completion = ['<C-k>', '<Up>']
let g:ycm_autoclose_preview_window_after_completion = 1
let g:ycm_server_python_interpreter = '/usr/local/bin/python3'

let g:NERDTreeDirArrowExpandable = '▸'
let g:NERDTreeDirArrowCollapsible = '▾'

"" 숨김파일 보이도록 처리
let NERDTreeShowHidden=1

nmap <C-a> :NERDTreeToggle<CR>
"autocmd filetype cpp nnoremap <C-w> :w <bar> exec '!g++ '.shellescape('%').'-o '.shellescape('%:r').' && ./'.shellescape('%:r')<CR>
nmap <C-e> :w<Enter>: !python3 %<Enter>

" <F1> 폴딩
map <F1> v]}zf
" <F2> 창이동
map <C-z> <C-w><C-w>

"::> <C-w><C-w>
map <F9> :bp<cr>
map <F10> :bn<cr>

nmap <C-d> :TagbarToggle<CR>
" <F7> shell
map <F7> :VimShell<cr>
"vim-multiple-cursor
" vim-multiple-cursor
let g:multi_cursor_use_default_mapping=0
" Default mapping
let g:multi_cursor_next_key='<C-n>'
let g:multi_cursor_prev_key='<C-p>'
let g:multi_cursor_skip_key='<C-x>'
let g:multi_cursor_quit_key='<Esc>'
"colorschem airline
let g:airline_theme='raven'

"find speed up
let g:ctrlp_custom_ignore = {
   \ 'dir':  '\.git$\|public$\|log$\|tmp$\|vendor$',
     \ 'file': '\v\.(exe|so|dll)$'
       \ }
" indent line
let g:indentLine_char_list = ['|', '¦', '┆', '┊']

" Highlight all instances of word under cursor, when idle.
" Useful when studying strange source code.
" Type z/ to toggle highlighting on/off.
nnoremap z/ :if AutoHighlightToggle()<Bar>set hls<Bar>endif<CR>
function! AutoHighlightToggle()
   let @/ = ''
   if exists('#auto_highlight')
     au! auto_highlight
     augroup! auto_highlight
     setl updatetime=4000
     echo 'Highlight current word: off'
     return 0
  else
    augroup auto_highlight
    au!
    au CursorHold * let @/ = '\V\<'.escape(expand('<cword>'), '\').'\>'
    augroup end
    setl updatetime=500
    echo 'Highlight current word: ON'
  return 1
 endif
endfunction

감사합니다.

entry.title: BOJ3034 앵그리 창영 - PYTHON
entry.content:
PYTHON CODE

import sys

class boj3034:

    def __init__(self):

        self.boxSize = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))


    def bojf(self):


        #박스에 들어갈 수 있는 크기인지 묻는 문제이다.
        #대각선 길이가 가장 크므로, 변의 길이를 알려주고 있어서 피타고라스 공식을 이용
        #대각선의 길이와 성냥의 길이를 비교한다.
        for i in range(self.boxSize[0]):

            if int(sys.stdin.readline()) > (((self.boxSize[1]**2) + (self.boxSize[2]**2))** 0.5):
                print('NE')
            else:
                print('DA')

K = boj3034()
K.bojf()

문제출처

BEAKJOON ONLINE JUDGE

감사합니다.

entry.title: BOJ5217 쌍의 합 - PYTHON
entry.content:
PYTHON CODE

import sys

class boj5043:

    def __init__(self):

        self.s = int(sys.stdin.readline())

    def bojf(self):

        for i in range(self.s):
            N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
            op = f"Pairs for {N}: "
            op = f'Pairs for {N}: '

            for j in range(1, N//2+1):
                for k in range(N//2 + 1, N + 1):

                    if j + k > N:
                        continue
                    elif j != k and j + k == N:
                        op += f'{j} {k}, '

            if op == f'Pairs for {N}: ':
                print(op)
            else:
                print(op[:-2])

K = boj5043()
K.bojf()

문제출처

BEAKJOON ONLINE JUDGE

감사합니다.

entry.title: BOJ5073 삼각형과 세 변 - PYTHON
entry.content:
PYTHON CODE

import sys

def boj5073():

    while True :

        N = 0
        treeLength = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

        treeLength.sort()

        if treeLength[0] == 0 and treeLength[1] == 0 and treeLength[2] == 0:
            break

        if  treeLength[2] < treeLength[0] + treeLength[1]:

            for i in treeLength:
                N = max(N, treeLength.count(i))

            if N == 1 :
                print('Scalene')
            elif N == 2 :
                print('Isosceles')
            elif N == 3 :
                print('Equilateral')
        else:
            print('Invalid')

boj5073()

문제출처

BEAKJOON OLINE JUDGE

감사합니다.

entry.title: BOJ3029 경고 - PYTHON
entry.content:
PYTHON CODE

import sys

class boj3029:

    def __init__(self):

        self.A = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split(':')))
        self.B = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split(':')))

    def boj3029(self):

        timeA = self.A[0] * 60 * 60 + self.A[1] * 60 + self.A[2]
        timeB = self.B[0] * 60 * 60 + self.B[1] * 60 + self.B[2]
        time24 = 24 * 60 * 60
	
	# 조건상으로 시간이 같을 때, 00:00:00이 아닌 24시간으로 처리된다. 
        if timeA == timeB:
            print('24:00:00')

        elif timeA < timeB :

            timeSum = timeB - timeA

            hour = timeSum // 60 // 60
            minute = timeSum // 60 % 60
            second = timeSum % 60
            print(f'{hour:02d}:{minute:02d}:{second:02d}')

        else:
            timeSum = time24 - timeA + timeB

            hour = timeSum // 60 // 60
            minute = timeSum // 60 % 60
            second = timeSum % 60

            print(f'{hour:02d}:{minute:02d}:{second:02d}')

K = boj3029()
K.boj3029()

문제출처

BOJ

감사합니다.

entry.title: BOJ4619 맞은 사람 - PYTHON
entry.content:
PYTHON CODE


import sys

def boj4619():

    while True:
        cnt = 1
        ans = list()
        A, B = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
        ans.append(cnt ** B  - A)

        if A == 0 & B == 0:
            break

        while True:
            cnt += 1
            tmp = cnt ** B - A
            if abs(ans[-1]) <= abs(tmp) :
                break
            else:
                ans.append(tmp)

        print(cnt - 1)

boj4619()

문제출처

Beakjoon Online Judge

감사합니다.

entry.title: BOJ4010 크냐? - PYTHON
entry.content:
PYTHON CODE

import sys

class boj4101:

    def bojf(self):

        while True :

            A = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

            if A[0] == 0 & A[1] == 0:
                break

            elif A[0] > A[1] :

                print('YES')
            else:
                print('NO')



K = boj4101()
K.bojf()

문제출처

BOJ

감사합니다.

entry.title: BOJ3028 창영마을 - PYTHON
entry.content:
PYTHON CODE

class boj3028:

    def __init__(self):

        self.cycle = list(input())


    # tmp 변수를 이용해서 위치를 변경했다.
    # ball[0], ball[1] = ball[1], ball[0] 으로 변경하는 방법도 있다.
    def bojf(self):

        ball = [1,0,0]
        tmp = 0
        for i in self.cycle:

            if i == "A" :
                tmp = ball[0]
                ball[0] = ball[1]
                ball[1] = tmp

            elif i == "B" :

                tmp = ball[1]
                ball[1] = ball[2]
                ball[2] = tmp

            else :
                tmp = ball[0]
                ball[0] = ball[2]
                ball[2] = tmp

        for i in range(len(ball)):

            if ball[i] == 1:
                print(i+1)


K = boj3028()
K.bojf()

문제출처

BOJ


감사합니다.

entry.title: BOJ2991 사나운 개 - PYTHON
entry.content:
PYTHON CODE

import sys

class boj2991:

    def __init__(self):
        self.A = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

        self.B = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

    # 0이 되는 경우는 불포함하기 때문에 주의한다.
    def bojf(self):



        for i in range(len(self.B)):
            cnt = 0

            for j in range(0, len(self.A), 2):

                if (self.B[i] % (self.A[j] + self.A[j+1])) == 0:
                    continue

                if(self.B[i] % (self.A[j] + self.A[j+1])) <= self.A[j] :
                    cnt += 1

            print(cnt)
K = boj2991()
K.bojf()

문제출처

BOJ

entry.title: BOJ2935 소음 - PYTHON
entry.content:
PYTHON CODE


class boj2935:

    def __init__(self):
        self.A = list()

        for i in range(3):

            self.A.append(input())

    def bojf(self):

        if self.A[1] == "+":

            print(int(self.A[0]) + int(self.A[2]))
        else:
            print(int(self.A[0]) * int(self.A[2]))

A = boj2935()
A.bojf()

문제출처

BOJ
